meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'staticpub'

languageKey.label: Static Publishing

Folders to export, seperated with Semicolon.
Seperate the target with double points.
Example:
typo3Temp/staticpub:../static/pages;
typo3temp/staticRecources:../static/cdn
staticpubExport
Export the content of static pub
